website_summaries.verdict: A luxury lap desk offering supreme comfort while specializing in functional accessories.
pros: Sliding mouse deck pulls out to both right and left sides
The large design conveniently fits most laptops and smartphones
cons: The ultra-slick mouse deck makes it easy for a mouse to slide off
Some customers wish the product were a little smaller

customer_reviews.title: The light doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. But, the light broke after only a handful of uses. I contacted customer service to see if they could send me a replacement part and they said no because it was past the 30-day warranty. Yes, it’s been about 4 months since my purchase. But, as I said, I’ve only used it a handful of times. The light should last longer than that. It was a great design. But, if they can’t stand behind their products, then I can’t recommend the item.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Loved this lap top desk
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lap top desk! It is just the right size, and I love all of the pockets to put a pad or a cell phone! The pull out mouse pad is super handy as is the light. The only small thing I would suggest is that they had in either their description or instructions that there is a pocket for the light storage, and also that it has a zipper pocket that contains the battery to run the light. It was not hard to figure this out however, and it is really convenient to have the ability to detach the light and store it.. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn howe

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, spacious and amazing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister who is always working on her laptop at home in front of her TV... I didn’t know if it would have enough room to fit her laptop or if it made more for a tablet and keyboard.. but she LOVES it and uses it all the time. She told me that she didn’t want anything fancy, but she never expected to love it as much as she does! The laptop does fit it perfect, as you can see! Getting one for myself too once they are back in stock! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I would give this ten stars!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I do not have anything negative to say! I'm in ministry and so I'm reading my bible and using my laptop almost everyday and this is perfect! I hate sitting at my desk writing so this is a life saver. I would just use a pillow and realized that it wasn't good for my pillows or by computer. I have a a big laptop and it fit perfect! I was even able to get a wireless mouse which I couldn't if I didn't have this. The lighting is great! When I highlight my bible the light would make it pop! I'm an amazon junkie and this is probably one of the best investments!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best WFH accessory
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help my work from home situation during the Covid-19 quarantine and a few days in - this has greatly upgraded my work situation. The product is even better quality than I expected. The wood is nice quality. The pillow underneath is also top notch. I haven't purchased the AA batteries needed for the light yet but I anticipate that it's a great addition for people that need it. I will say I'm in no rush for the batteries because I don't see myself using the lamp very often but it is a nice option to have. Super impressed with this and already emailed my co-workers to tell them they need to get one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop holder thing to avoid sore wrists at home.
customer_reviews.text: Great! I unfortunately bring work home and catch up on it on the sofa or bed and this is prefect! I love the sparkle of the black and the super bright light. It may be user error, probably, but sometimes when using my mouse- it slides off the mouse holder thing. Ok- maybe a lot. It slides off a lot. But other then picking up your mouse off the floor 4-5 times before you realize you can’t tilt it towards you- it’s great!! No but for real, it’s so helpful, it’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Carina

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk
customer_reviews.text: I read tons of reviews and was able to personally inspect many lap desks before I made my decision. I'm very happy with my purchase. Memory foam is used on the bottom (against your legs) and doesn't cause fatigue while using it. Mouse mat slides to either left or right side. There is a slot to hold a cell phone and a long indented tray to hold pens, pencils or glasses (as I use mine for). USB light plugs into lap desk or into laptop. When not in use, light can be stored in zippered compartment on lap desk.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Randall

customer_reviews.title: Lap Desks by Which the Others Are Judged
customer_reviews.text: We had a failed attempt with another lap desk ... I read some reviews the second time around and was specifically looking for a lap desk that gave off a decent amount of light to read a book. I checked with a reviewer who responded to say we wouldn't be disappointed with this one. And we weren't. Excellent lighting and versatile offerings on this lap desk. Happy as can be!
customer_reviews.author: terry93004

customer_reviews.title: You don’t know how bad you need one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Ok have worked only on my IPad for years and and pretty good at using it on my lap, but this thing is like a breath of fresh air when you are used to working on your lap. I use it on my lap and on my desk. They need to put a pocket in it for a battery pack/
customer_reviews.author: Roy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product - solid mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item so I could work on Shutterfly albums on my laptop on the couch while watching TV with my family. It's fantastic and the ability to use a mouse with the solid slide-out mouse pad makes work so much quicker and more efficient than using the laptop tracker pad. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice potable desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. I used it for about a half hour. It became too heavy and began to hurt my legs. I do have neurological problems to keep in mind. My daughter loves it though. Great quality, smooth surface. Nice height underneath and slots for pad and phone work. Just don't tilt lap desk up to much, because pad and phone will fall forward. So don't cross your legs :)
customer_reviews.author: CWTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The only was to use your lap top while seated.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years and I have grown to love it. I now use it on my desk top too. I like that it gives me a soft pad for my wrists. I like that there is a light. I love the memory foam. I love the it has a slight angle that makes typing easier. It was a gift from my Grandma and I have bought two more. My bother loves is too. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten one of these years ago! I've had a work laptop for several years and always sat at my kitchen island which isn't the most comfortable place to sit all day. Eventually, I'd end up on the couch with my laptop on my lap and it would get hot and I always had to use the touchpad. I love that this has a place for my mouse and my phone. The wrist pad is perfect for comfort. It's not too heavy or awkward. Great investment if you want to work from the comfort of your couch without sacrifice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space-saver!
customer_reviews.text: This desk works perfectly for what I wanted. There's enough room for my 17 inch keyboard and the pull out mouse pad so I don't have to use space on the desk portion. The light is great for lighting the keyboard at night if I don't want to have all the lights on. Really a great, space saving alternative to a conventional desk and chair.
customer_reviews.author: A.E. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My coworker has one and used it while we were out on sales calls. He liked it so much that I decided to buy one for my wife who was always hassling with her laptop. She absolutely loves it! It enabled her to sit comfortably while on the couch or in bed. She loves the light and so do I because I don't need the lights on while she's working. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice van der Sluys

customer_reviews.title: Love this lap desk
customer_reviews.text: I work from home often and wanted a space for my two phones and laptop while I can sit on my comfy couch. This fits the bill perfectly. Almost too perfect as my husband wanted one soon after. Unfortunately Costco was sold out so I found it on Amazon. Now we have his and hers. Best product ever, oh and the slide out goes left and right depending on your preference.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Only a few complaints: Mouse Pad : Doesn't slide across easily, It definitely keeps it from falling off however! Phone Holder: if your phone has a covering on it , makes for a tight fit. Pen/Pencil Holder: will allow them to fall through Tablet Option: is not great at all, tablet will not stand up in it correctly without being hands free, always holding on to it to keep it up right. LED Light: not as bright as you would think but, does add a little extra little to the key board if working in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I use this lap desk for school work EVERY DAY. It is comfortable, handy, and just all around awesome. I purchased the Black Glittery one and its soo pretty :) Also purchase the lap desk with the light switch, it's just a few more dollars but totally worth it! I mainly use this lap desk to hold my MacBook Air 13" laptop, but it is big enough that I can read/write you name it!
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonQueen19

customer_reviews.title: The best of the FOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my partner who is a dedicated ORIGAMI practitioner, and she loves it! The main platform has a nicely finished surface and is just the right size for folding paper into myriad animal forms, stars, boxes, and whatever. As a Lefty, she likes that the sliding shelf con be used on either side, so she can use it to write notes or just keep her phone handy. The LED light is a big plus, too, or it can be stored out of the way in the designated pouch. This Sofia + Sam Lap Desk is great for working from the couch, or bed, or floor, or just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Lazuka

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I love it the mouse thing is small for the mouse and the light thing isn’t the best but I don’t use that overall I love it and still give it 5 stars I use another thing for the mouse thing sometimes a pad ergonomic that I can lay on anything next to me that’s easier but the one that pulls out is still often convenient
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this product to keep my printer level in my truck. The seats are an incline and so without this base the printer is leaned back. With the bottom supports it creates a level surface for my printer to sit on. I’m sure it works well for what it was originally designed for as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer

customer_reviews.title: the cushion is nice, but it seems to heat up my lap ...
customer_reviews.text: does the job, the cushion is nice, but it seems to heat up my lap with extended usage. i also feel the little pad on the front is useless with a laptop. With my laptop the keyboard is higher then the rest so all it accomplishes is to keep the laptop from sliding off. Regardless of the little faults i still think it is a great product to do some work on the laptop while sitting on the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: M.I.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! A lot of people complain about specific things with lap desks so: A. First of all, no smell at all B. Second, nothing broken, all in pristine condition. C. Third, great instructions, no damage to box D. The wrist pad is very comfy E. Just so darn cute and sparkly!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Be productive / entertained in comfort
customer_reviews.text: This has become a staple for me. Good for using the laptop, tablet (with or without bluetooth keyboard), keeping the cell phone nearby / syncing devices, doing work. I use the pull out tray for a mouse or sometimes even as a mini side table for a snack. I don't recommend using it as a coaster while using electrical devices / handling papers. My daughter loves to let me plug in the light and do her homework on it. Comfortable to keep on your lap, keeps devices from overheating from being on something soft and from radiating heat onto your lap. I find it encourages better posture because the just right elevation and the wrist cushioning is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: CMPriz

customer_reviews.title: My 17.5" laptop fits on this lap desk!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17.5" laptop so it covers the whole top of the desk but it is stable and doesn't slide around. I like the angle of the desk and the wrist pad at the front keeps the laptop in place. Because my laptop is large, I cannot access the slot at the back of the desktop but I'm fine with that. The light has multiple (small) LED lights so it will be great to use when traveling at night. The only downside I've found is that the memory foam makes me warm but it's better than placing the laptop directly on my lap!
customer_reviews.author: Waldeckers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for multi-taskers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for multi-taskers. Like me. Looks good, too. Best of all, Sofia + Sam stand behind their product. When my order arrived, I could not get the light to work. Called in on a Saturday morning. Got a real person. A friendly person. A knowledgeable person, She quickly ran me thru some trouble shooting to find out that the light worked, but somehow the wiring did not. Sofia + Sam sent me another desk immediately. It works perfectly. So, I wanted pass forward my very favorable impression of their product and especially their service.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is great. It sits nicely on your lap and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Surface Pro 15". It is a bit small for the Surface Pro due to the tablet slot in the back that makes it a bit tricky for the keyboard attachment and Pro without the kickstand falling into the tablet slot. Other than that it is great. It sits nicely on your lap and is made well with a nice heft to it that is not to heavy. The mouse slide that can hold your phone pops out on either side so it works for a lefty as well as a righty.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Booooooooo.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Needs to be wider for adults. This only adequate for children. I want to be comfortable using a laptop. I feel like I'm planking trying to make this crap work. Also, it doesn't work. The only reason I chose this one from any of the 50+ others out there I should have bought was the light. News flash importer from China, if you keep shipping packages in the cheapest and smallest boxes possible, there's no chance anyone will want it. It literally looks like Ace Ventura delivered it...none of the sides of the box are flat. Boooooooo.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for remote teaching
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It saved my back while remote teaching. The tray slips out on the left or right side. The cushion is super comfy. The wrist pad makes working much easier. It’s very useful and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: My lap desk is perfect for coloring on, the smooth surface not leaving marks where my pencils pass over the page. I ordered this specific lap desk for coloring purposes, and was thrilled to have a light available! My light, however, was not working, so I resigned myself to having just a very nice desk. I contacted customer service, and after just a little troubleshooting with them, they're sending me a free replacement! I'm very happy with their service and speed in responding to me.
customer_reviews.author: Skylark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great design
customer_reviews.text: I love this lap desk. The one I have is close to 15 years old. I didn't have room for my mouse when I use a full keyboard plugged into my laptop. This mousepad is compatible with right or left handed people. It's very sturdy and has nice storage for the light when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Best lap desk I have ever bought. The light requires 4 double a batteries and it is a really great light. The mouse tray on the side is both for right and left handed people. The wrist pillow is really soft yet sturdy enough to last. Totally recommend buying it .
customer_reviews.author: A'Reyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for large laptops
customer_reviews.text: Fit the bill. Got as a present for girlfriend. She has a 17.9” laptop but liked using a mouse. This fit the bill best. Could fit her laptop and allows a mouse. The led light is a little hard to use but it was just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: SMc

customer_reviews.title: The light is NOT worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lap desk with the light because I was hoping to used this when in bed some times. I was hoping the light could be used to read my text book or take notes. Not the case. The light is not bright enough to do anything with. In the dark, you can barely tell the light is turned on. It is IMPOSSIBLE to see anything with it let alone read. My laptop screen produces more light than the light.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I truly like my laptop lap table. It's comfortable, sturdy and the mousepad is such a great addition. It offers great protection against heating up the computer and my lap, plus it brings my office right to my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina M. Passos

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how I completely missed that this lap table has a light, but I was very pleasantly surprised when I received it! I love the little storage space for the light, and I also love that the mouse tray can go either to the left or the right. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MISTY PLATT

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious!
customer_reviews.text: Ingenious product! I love the extra little table on the side and the light come in handy more than I expected it to. Also, it is still pretty light weight considering it has all the extra features. Very helpful and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jbrown_leo

customer_reviews.title: Great support - top and bottom!
customer_reviews.text: So far my daughter likes this laptop desk. We bought it for her to take to college, so she can sit in her bed comfortably with her laptop. Most laptop desks are cheap and uncomfortable, and the bottom cushioning breaks down easily (like the one I am currently using). This looks and feels solid - both on the top and the bottom. The only reason I did not give it 5-stars is that my daughter has not used it much yet (she leaves for college is a few weeks). I will update this review after she has had a chance to use it a while.
customer_reviews.author: Value Privacy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my well worn one. Great investment! I'm using it during business hours for my laptop with no problems. It supports the laptop and mouse. I'm also using it for my artwork. My books are stabilized, I can place my markers in the slots for easy access. My iPad and iPhone fit in the slots as well. There's a nice little cushion inside the pockets, no worries of unwanted scratches on my devices. The light is bright and flexible. I'm able to angle it in any direction.
customer_reviews.author: S Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn't work..
customer_reviews.text: while using it is very comfortable. Love the memory foam! As soon as I received it today I tried to use the light, but it did not work. I placed 4 new batteries and double checked to make sure they were in correctly. Light still does not work. I am giving 3 stars because I am torn. It seems to be a bigger hassle to send it back over the light but I did pay $20 extra to have the light and slide out mouse pad. This item should have been tested before it was sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lap desk for when I'm writing in my recliner. It's easy on my legs, and the light is a nice touch. My only issue is that the battery for the light is not a USB standard connection but rather uses 4 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: dlhitzeman

customer_reviews.title: MOUSE USERS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: You can read all the positives on other reviews.. all true. It's nice, unless you use a mouse. The panel that slides out is a shade on the small side, but manageable. What makes it absolutely unusable is the fact that the surface is so slippery, the mouse slides off the second you lift your hand. The lapdesk itself is angled, so even when resting on a flat surface, it slides off. I've used it for a couple of days trying to make it work... it just won't. I'm giving it away to someone who doesn't use a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and Extremely Functional
customer_reviews.text: Usually pics of a product look better than the merchandise is person. In this case it's the other way around. It's not only beautiful but completely functional and quite comfortable to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Itjustmakessense

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lap Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality Lap Desk and is well made. I use mine all the time and I bought several for friends to sue and they love them, also. The USB LED light is a really nice feature. The items all shipped to be very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while I was working remotely and it worked out perfectly. It kept my laptop off my lap and the little pull out tray for the mouse is very nice. Everything sits at a comfortable level.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Murray

customer_reviews.title: Size is great, but three problems for me
customer_reviews.text: Size is great, but three problems for me: 1) it's too heavy too use on my lap for more than an hour; 2) the light feature was broken before I got it (great idea if it would have worked!!!); 3) mouse keeps sliding off (would be better if the edges were raised slightly). Otherwise, works as expected and size is good. Have only used with laptop though. Please read someone else's account for tablet effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great Lap Desk for Tablets & Laptops
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lap desk. It has slots to hold both my tablet and android and I can also use my laptop computer on it. I like using a mouse and there is pull out shelf for it. It is lightweight and comfortable on my lap. The light uses 4 batteries, which I don't like very much, so I really don't use the light. I also wish that the desk had a cooling fan as I sometimes use my computer for long periods of time. This is by far the best lap desk I have been able to find.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This portable desk works perfectly to keep my laptop from burning my lap. The cushion is soft and comfortable. The bonus is having the light for evening work, and of course the holder for my phone is wonderful. Equally important is the soft pad at the front keeps my wrist from hurting when typing. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AWESOME! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Don’t buy any of the cheaper ones, get this one. Well worth it! It’s super comfortable, laptop doesn’t slide around or move at all, mouse fits great on slide out shelf. Wrist support is great and has good cushion. I don’t use light or phone slot so nothing to say about those.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lough

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and requires batteries
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Cushion is dense, comfortable, and seems like it will not flatten out quickly, but be good for longer use. I appreciate that the additional side piece slides out on either side. The top is sparkly, which I was not expecting. I did not realize that the LED light ran on batteries. They were not included and I am not a fan of disposable batteries. I assumed it came with a rechargeable battery pack like almost everything nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Beth

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good features
customer_reviews.text: Ive had been for over a year and it is holding up well. Has everything I need to be comfortable while using it with my phone, ipad, or laptop. Even got one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his lap desk. I’m jealous because it’s so much nicer than mine. Really well thought out. I appreciate the little pocket to keep the lamp when not using it. I want one for myself but it’s a little pricey so I’ll make due with my basic lap desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to Your Friends
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lap desk since I needed to sit with my leg elevated for many weeks. It is my new work desk and is amazing. It saves your wrists and is comfortable. The light is very functional. I have been recommending this to anyone who sits on the couch with their computer or iPad. I even ordered one for a family member! Well made and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision Made!!
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time working on my computer and my wrists were tiring out. This desk makes it much more comfortable, my legs are definitely cooler now. Even though it's made for a 15" screen, I can also fit a 17" screen computer on the desk. Having a separate tray for the mouse is an added bonus and it can be accessed on both sides! I haven't tried the lamp yet and unable to review that accessory; however, I am recommending this lap desk to my friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable workstation!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, I use it when I’m mostly in bed, for my laptop or tablet. It is very sturdy, well-made and soft on the bottom. I also really appreciate the mouse pad, for both right and left handed people. And when you lie down or in the chair, it is very handy to have the area your mouse can easily work on. I have bought it for myself, and also as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kseniia Bezkrovna

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk just oozes quality from, from the desk's surface to its cushions to its LED light to its tablet slot. Every bit of this shows excellent design and solid construction. It's beautiful to look at and a pleasure to use. I'm very happy I bought this fine piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have to work from home and balancing the PC on my lap near the window was difficult. Sure I have a desk but I prefer to sit by the window with the view and natural light as I and self-contain and completing my work. The phone holder and mouse pad thingy pulls out on the left and right providing options for those who are left handed which I am not; I just impressed by the consideration. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jewna E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Very well made. The light is a great bonus. The tablet slot is large enough for my iPad, the light detaches for easy storage. Believe it or not, they were promised to arrive on a Monday, but actually arrived the Friday before!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. I love that the extra platform can be used on the left or the right. Also, it's great that the light is detachable for storage. The switch can get in the way for large books or laptops, but it is usually not an issue Overall it's great. It arrived on time and the product is even better then expected. I use it quite a bit and the battery life is great. The handle makes it easier to take with me wherever I need it. I recommended this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyRose

customer_reviews.title: Best lap desk available.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband so he could be comfortable when he had to work from home. He absolutely loves it. He likes the extendable mouse section, but absolutely loves the light. I thought it was just an extra, kind of a gimmick. But he just raved about how much it helps him see the keys on the laptop. I was concerned, too, that I would regret not buying another lap desk that was most liked and bought on Amazon, but this one is an absolute winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: A Few Issues
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this laptop desk as I work from home and needed a functional desk. Unfortunately there were issues: the light does not work when plugged in to the desktop USB port (and yes, I used 4 brand new AA batteries, and there were 2 places on the material which were snagged. The snags were very small, but when I purchase a new product, I expect there to not be snags in material. Sending back, but since I love the make, I will reorder another and keep my fingers crossed that it will arrive with a working light and no snags!
customer_reviews.author: luvn2limes

customer_reviews.title: What a perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: In short, this is an amazing product and I'm looking to get one for each member of my family, because they've seen mine and everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SPDworks

customer_reviews.title: High quality and ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lap desk I have ever seen. It sits perfectly on the lap and the wrists are supported. I love the pull out mouse pad shelf too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall very nice, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Build quality very good. It is comfortato use. My only gripe is that the light will not work in all positions. Sounds like a loose wire in the bendable neck. I'll send an email and hopefully they will replace it so I won't have to return the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: rumblee1

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Use at home for work laptop and much better than a pillow. The light is awesome extra that can be stored away when not in use. Pull out table for mouse comes in handy as I use a separate mouse and not laptop mouse pad. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Vinovrski-Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Probably my best purchase so far this year.
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of my computer time in bed in the early hours. Getting up and sitting at a table insures I will not go back to sleep so this was a great option. I love the mouse tray and especially the light.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna M Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Lap Desk
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive lap desk that appears to be very well-made and sturdy. It's larger than I expected, but will work well for most areas, just a bit too large for my favorite chair, so measure carefully before you purchase. It's also very shiny, and would be better if it had a dull surface, but that can be easily remedied if necessary. If you have a small tablet, you might want to use a Wedge, or some other holder, so you can bring the tablet or phone closer.
customer_reviews.author: bluesundown

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - wish mouse tray had lip on it
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these - 2 w/ lights (for me, Mom, son). We all really like these. The only negative as that the pullout mouse tray doesn't have any sort of lip on it, so if the lap desk is not close to completely flat, the mouse slides off. I didn't even think to check the tray before purchasing since every other laptop holder I've had has had a lip for the mouse tray. It only bothers me b/c I still use a mouse vs a touchpad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the writing life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a writers' retreat. I love it. Use it all the time! Since my laptop doesn't have backlit keys, the small light is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Madhatter

customer_reviews.title: I love these, they make working on your laptop so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they make working on your laptop so much more pleasant. They are so much more comfortable than the bean bag versions.
customer_reviews.author: MamaGord

customer_reviews.title: Great for remote work options!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and wanted to find a solution for when I am not sitting at my desk. This helps to break up the day so I can move to other locatons in the house but still have a nice lightweight set up! I would highly recommend this. The only thing I would recommend for future versions would be something to catch the mouse from sliding off the little pull out shelf! :)
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very serviceable lap desk, well designed, comfortable, and convenient. The USB lamp and slide-out mouse pad (left or right) add to its value and utility.
customer_reviews.author: Paleobiology Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: He loves that the mouse pad can be used for either left or right handed users and the phone holder makes it easy for him to keep from losing his phone all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and he loves it! He loves that the mouse pad can be used for either left or right handed users and the phone holder makes it easy for him to keep from losing his phone all the time in the seat cushions lol. The light is a bonus. Think I'll have to buy one for me too!
customer_reviews.author: Mjgurney2111

customer_reviews.title: Good buy - very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this to work from home on my laptop. When I want to work from the couch it's very convenient. The one thing that may cause issues is the fabric. The seam ripped but I sewed it to make it more sturdy. It's just fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Alex

customer_reviews.title: such a great investment. If you are sick at home but ...
customer_reviews.text: such a great investment. If you are sick at home but still need to get work done, no need to be stuck at the desk. I can do work comfortably on my sofa or in bed. I should have bought two because everyone in my house always want sot use it. required 4 AA batteries for the light. which seemed like a lot to me for such a tiny lamp. But it shines pretty bright. batteries should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I love the quality and the design is genius. It's better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk!
customer_reviews.text: Great lap top desk. Holds laptop and/ or tablet for easy view. Light is a big plus. A little hard to find it tucked away in a pocket and need your own batteries. but very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Patty

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. It was a bonus that the tray slides from left to right. I do wish there was some holding it in place better. The lap and wrist pads are comfortable and hasn't worn out in a few months of use. The slot for the tablet is big and should fit most tablets. This was a very good purchase. I just need them to make it in purple!
customer_reviews.author: Reneja

customer_reviews.title: GREAT lap desk, but...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 was because when using the mouse pad feature the mouse slides off if using the desk at an angle. I really like that you can use the mouse pad on both the right and left hand sides, but it would be nice if it was adjustable to keep levl to prevent from sliding. Other than that, this lap desk is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: TI

customer_reviews.title: If you need a portable lap desk... This is the one you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: As an calligraphy and typigraphist, I am constantly working on different fonts or transcripts so I needed a lap desk that was small enough to carry around but large enough to hold my larger sketch books. Not only is it a wonderfully perfect size--made of quality material-- a sown on handle for transporting--both a tablet and phone holder built ins-- extra surface space tucked away underneath the desktop---AND THE COOLEST PART... The portable light---which is discretely hidden out of the way for safe travels!! I love this lap desk!!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Its very nice ..
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't anything that i don't like about it except they made the table holder different the the old one i have.. so other than that it is very nice..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Best lapdesk ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mine every day for a year now and just purchased one for my mother who recently switched from a desktop to a laptop. She LOVES it and uses it on her couch or her bed. She loves the handy pullout for the mouse because she prefers to use the mouse. I can't recommend this lapdesk highly enough. Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: A. Diez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a laptop with room for a mouse, my phone, and papers I may be working with. What a great product! And the light is so handy if you don’t want a full overhead light. It is spacious, not too heavy, and sturdy. The wrist rest not only holds the laptop but makes typing comfortable. This is the best lap pad I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: College lap desk
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter to use at college next year. It feels comfortable & sturdy. Looks very nice as well
customer_reviews.author: KrysRich

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Allowed me to work efficiently from my bed while I recovered from surgery. My laptop fits perfectly, the light is perfect and easy to maneuver to my liking, my cellphone fits great in the compartment provided, and I’m able to easily mouse on the provided shelf that I can have on either side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best and Softest Lap Desk  for all!
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable lap Desk. My error was buying a size too small for myself.. I am still going to use this since it keeps my laptop steady. Sofia and Sam have a very good product and I recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early & didn't disappoint! Please buy. The memory form is soooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Doresa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: Since I am either constantly at work, or doing school work I was looking for something to allow me to use my laptop while spending time with family. This product did the trick! It allows me to sit in the living room with my family and do homework while watching a movie. Also the light allows me to do homework in bed, without having a bright light on and waking someone else up!
customer_reviews.author: cmbarker13

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says. The light is a very useful attachment. stows away nicely
customer_reviews.author: fadi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product?
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! We loved ours wow we purchased this one to give as a gift. She loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love using my laptop on it and coloring. Love how it has the little lamp for my coloring and the little slot for my phone and how it amps the sound on my phone by placing it there. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for my teen
customer_reviews.text: My teen loves this desk. So many nice features and nice finish on it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lap desk. It's exactly as advertised. The light works perfectly, the table for the mouse slides out easily, and the top of the desk is smooth and sturdy. The only thing that was surprising was that it is a little bit heavy. I think this will end up being good because it will stay put on your lap. I only mention it because it is noticeably heavier than the regular lap desk I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: So useful and comfortable for hours on end, where I can work on my homework with or without the bedroom lights on (I share a room with my partner, so if they need to sleep, they can do so in the dark). I love the USB light fixture so that I can work on my writing projects. I highly recommend this product to any student who needs the comfort they need when they don't have the available space in their own homes to own a huge desk. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 13pockystix

customer_reviews.title: Defective and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Came defective out of the packaging. The vinyl cover is already bubbling and coming off the edges. They is a tear in the seam. Cheaply manufactured and overpriced. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Practical, excellent quality product! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The product was as described and came in mint condition. very ergonomic. I am typing this on my macbook air that is on the lap desk. I have placed a bigger sized laptop (DELL Latitude) and had no issues. The LED light works great too. The handle is super convenient too. I bought two, one with a wood grain finish and one in black.
customer_reviews.author: Magz

customer_reviews.title: Contacted provider - light not working -
customer_reviews.text: This was months ago already....I was told to keep the lapdesk I have and they would send a new one immediately, that would work. I have not received anything. I have an item with no lamp.....
customer_reviews.author: Luminous Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great mini workstation.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great last desk. The pull out mouse pad and phone holder works great and I love the small overhead light. It works great as a mini work station. Happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: mhelen

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bottom pad conforms well to your lap for stability. Pull out mouse pad is small but perfect for the application. Instructions indicate a 9v for the light but actually uses (4) AA. Finish is very nice on the black.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Sauls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lap desk!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this purchase. It is so comfortable and has a place for everything. I love the light and the pull out phone holder / mouse pad. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: GraciousMe

product_meta.title: Sofia + Sam Multi Tasking Memory Foam Lap Desk with USB Light and Mouse Pad - Portable Foldable Home Working Office Workstation - Bed Table Tray for Eating - Fits Computers Up to 15" - Soft Cushion
product_meta.description: Size:With USB Light| Color:Black TopThe Sofia + Sam Multi Media Memory Foam Lap Desk is the ultimate workstation for anyone using a laptop, tablet or smartphone. The lap desk allows you to work on a laptop or tablet, watch tv, write or read while staying alert to your phone for incoming calls and messages. It's the perfect portable desk for small spaces so you can work from home or your kids can learn online in comfort. Patent Pending
feature_bullets: MULTI-PURPOSE USE: works perfect for laptop computers, tablets, smart phones, etc. Fits laptop computers 13" to 15". Includes tablet slot that fits tablets 9.6 inches or smaller. The smart phone slot fits mobile devices 3.5 inches or smaller
MOUSE PAD: slide out mouse pad that pulls out on either the left or right side of the desk. The mouse pad also features a smart phone slot along with a hole so you can charge your device
MEMORY FOAM COMFORT: Cool and comfortable design built with a memory foam cushion, wrist rest and handle for portability

WORK FROM HOME: the perfect lap desk so you can get work done from the comfort of your bed! The lap desk allows you to use your 13” or 15” laptop and a computer mouse with plenty of room to spare. The tablet and smart phone slots allow you to easily see any incoming calls, messages or emails
Large work surface of 18.5" x 14" x 3.5". Patented D772596

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,140 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
